goodPractices:
1. The enterprise operates a Fair Price Shop providing essential goods and daily necessities at subsidized or discounted rate, typically 07-10% lower than market prices. The shop is stocked with over 150 essential items, including food staples, hygiene products, and household goods, helping workers reduce monthly living expenses and improve their overall wellbeing.
  2. The enterprise provided 2 packets of sanitary napkins monthly to every female worker of the factory at a discounted rate.
